quotes.text: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: Innovation distinguishes between a leader and a follower.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.text: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.text: It is during our darkest moments that we must focus to see the light.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.text: The only impossible journey is the one you never begin.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.text: In the middle of difficulty lies opportunity.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: The best time to plant a tree was 20 years ago. The second best time is now.
quotes.author: Chinese Proverb

quotes.text: Your time is limited, don't waste it living someone else's life.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.text: Don't let yesterday take up too much of today.
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.text: You learn more from failure than from success. Don't let it stop you.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: It's not whether you get knocked down, it's whether you get up.
quotes.author: Vince Lombardi

quotes.text: People who are crazy enough to think they can change the world, are the ones who do.
quotes.author: Rob Siltanen

quotes.text: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.text: The mind is everything. What you think you become.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.text: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today.
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.text: Do what you can, with what you have, where you are.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.text: Everything you've ever wanted is on the other side of fear.
quotes.author: George Addair

quotes.text: Success usually comes to those who are too busy to be looking for it.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.text: Don't be afraid to give up the good to go for the great.
quotes.author: John D. Rockefeller

quotes.text: I find that the harder I work, the more luck I seem to have.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.text: The secret of getting ahead is getting started.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.text: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.text: Everything has beauty, but not everyone can see.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.text: How wonderful it is that nobody need wait a single moment before starting to improve the world.
quotes.author: Anne Frank

quotes.text: Life is 10% what happens to you and 90% how you react to it.
quotes.author: Charles R. Swindoll

quotes.text: An unexamined life is not worth living.
quotes.author: Socrates

quotes.text: Eighty percent of success is showing up.
quotes.author: Woody Allen

quotes.text: I am not a product of my circumstances. I am a product of my decisions.
quotes.author: Stephen Covey

quotes.text: The best revenge is massive success.
quotes.author: Frank Sinatra

quotes.text: You miss 100% of the shots you don't take.
quotes.author: Wayne Gretzky

quotes.text: Whether you think you can or you think you can't, you're right.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.text: The two most important days in your life are the day you are born and the day you find out why.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.text: Whatever the mind of man can conceive and believe, it can achieve.
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.text: Strive not to be a success, but rather to be of value.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: The only person you are destined to become is the person you decide to be.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.text: Go confidently in the direction of your dreams. Live the life you have imagined.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.text: When I stand before God at the end of my life, I would hope that I would not have a single bit of talent left and could say, I used everything you gave me.
quotes.author: Erma Bombeck

quotes.text: Certain things catch your eye, but pursue only those that capture the heart.
quotes.author: Ancient Indian Proverb

quotes.text: Great minds discuss ideas; average minds discuss events; small minds discuss people.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.text: I have not failed. I've just found 10,000 ways that won't work.
quotes.author: Thomas A. Edison

quotes.text: A person who never made a mistake never tried anything new.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: The person who says it cannot be done should not interrupt the person who is doing it.
quotes.author: Chinese Proverb

quotes.text: There are no traffic jams along the extra mile.
quotes.author: Roger Staubach

quotes.text: It is never too late to be what you might have been.
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.text: You become what you believe.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.text: The most difficult thing is the decision to act, the rest is merely tenacity.
quotes.author: Amelia Earhart

quotes.text: Every strike brings me closer to the next home run.
quotes.author: Babe Ruth

quotes.text: Life is what happens to you while you're busy making other plans.
quotes.author: John Lennon
